slra.mathUtilities

Class Vector3f

  • java.lang.Object
    • slra.mathUtilities.Vector3f

  • public class Vector3f
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents 3D vectors and defines 3D vector operations
    Author:
    Henry Valentine Based on thebennybox 3D game Engine tutorial
